Hello Franco,

Thank you,  Fire damage is something I had not considered. =
 I've seen a
few articles concerning the characteristics of swords subjecte=
d to
intense heat.  I will definitely reread them and pay more attention as=

> Hello Dave,
>
> Based on the images, =
it needs to be determined whether this sword has
> been exposed to serious =
heat. The scaly-dry appearance of the steel
> is an indication that it migh=
t have been. Fires were a problem
> throughout Japan's history that affecte=
d many swords. There are
> articles written that describe to some degree wh=
at characteristics to
> look for.
> In general, this is one lesson many beg=
inners unfortunately
> experience at one time or another.

anco
